about.summary: Interface for querying installed libraries for use during compilation.

name: pkg-config
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "0.29.1" %}

package:
  name: pkg-config
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: pkg-config-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pkg-config.freedesktop.org/releases/pkg-config-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: beb43c9e064555469bd4390dcfd8030b1536e0aa103f08d7abf7ae8cac0cb001

build:
  skip: True  # [win]
  number: 0
  detect_binary_files_with_prefix: true

requirements:
  build:
    - zlib 1.2*
    - python
    - automake
  run:
    - zlib 1.2*

test:
  commands:
    - pkg-config --help
    - '[ "$(pkg-config freetype2 --cflags)" == "-I$PREFIX/include/freetype2" ]'

  requires:
    - freetype

about:
  home: http://www.freedesktop.org/wiki/Software/pkg-config/
  license: GPL 2
  summary: Interface for querying installed libraries for use during compilation.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jakirkham
    - mdboom
    - ocefpaf
    - tacaswell
